dublin_core.dcvalue: The problem of development of legal base has arisen last years on a wave of active introduction of telemedical technologies and disputes on legal regulation the Internet May 20 2002 carried out parliamentary hearings About telemedicine and information policy in sphere of protection of health of the citizens of Russian Federation The basic themes of statements were experience of use of telemedical technologies legal problems at rendering telemedical services necessity of formation of the State target program on telemedicine
Ėksperimental'nai͡a i klinicheskai͡a gastroėnterologii͡a = Experimental And clinical gastroenterology
